Pre-Game Insights: Under Surya Kumar Yadav’s captaincy, some youngsters will make their debut for the first time in International cricket and are eager to play their first match against Bangladesh.
India is expected to start with a winning streak after winning the test series.
The pitch at New Madhavrao Scindia Cricket Stadium is expected to be batting-friendly, offering true bounce and consistent pace.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The weather for Sunday, October 6, will be sunny with a high of 33°C and a low of 25°C, and no expected precipitation.
India and Bangladesh have faced each other in 14 matches in T20, with India winning 13 and Bangladesh winning once.
